name: Welcome to Sharang
description:
【Game Name】Welcome to Sharang

【Type】Adventure RPG

【Game Control】Keyboard or Gamepad

【Language】English,  Japanese

【Average gameplay time】10  hours

　　

Live in a countryside mansion while collecting cooking ingredients.

This is a story-driven game.

※This game is serialized. Currently, only part 1 is playable.

※This game has been translated by Jason Wells under the name of "Bolt翻訳".

 ―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――

Welcome to the mansion where children in distress dwell.

 

 ■

The player (you) was summoned as a new resident of a certain mansion.

 

In this mansion, cut off from the outside world,

children with their own unique circumstances have been gathered.

        

 

 

Depending on your choices and actions,

their "impression" of you (the protagonist) will change,

as you develop more ways to respond and unlock different options.


 

Spend your daily life together with them and unravel their m҉̢̛y҈̨͡s̶̢͝t҈̢͡ȩ̴̛r̵̨҇i̴͜͡e̸̢͞s̶̢̕

 ―――――――――――――――――――――――――――――――

Follow the development of the game, @twitter

For bug reports (or anything else) you can send them, Report Form
